long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that makes it easy to copy and store useful information while reading!

No more switching back and forth between a Web page and a Word document to copy and paste interesting texts, disrupting your reading flow. 

With this extension, you can automatically copy and save any selected text, and when you’re finished, you can download everything you've saved with a single click. 

Plus, it doesn’t matter if you wander off to a different Web page. It allows you to carry on seamlessly.

This Chrome Extension works well with ChatGPT, Gemini, and other generative AI tools.
